00020 class AdditiveSTDPNegExpFunction
00021 {
00022 protected:
00024 
00026     void set_params(double tauP, double tauD, double cP, double cD) {
00027         inv_tauP_ = 1 / tauP;
00028         inv_tauD_ = 1 / tauD;
00029         cP_ = cP;
00030         cD_ = cD;
00031         cutoffP_ = 5 * tauP;
00032         cutoffD_ = 5 * tauD;
00033         mass_ = tauP * cP + tauD * cD;
00034     }
00035 
00036     // a virer
00037     double operator()(const Time & t1, const Time & t2) {
00038         return (t1 < t2) ?
00039                cD_ * exp((t1 - t2)* inv_tauD_) :
00040                (t1 > t2) ?
00041                cP_ * exp((t2 - t1) * inv_tauP_) :
00042                0.;
00043     }
00044 
00045     inline double weight_change_impl(double & weight, const double & dt) const {
00046         return (dt == 0) ? 0. : (dt > 0) ? cP_ * exp(- dt * inv_tauP_) : cD_ * exp(dt * inv_tauD_);
00047     }
00048 
00049     double inv_tauP_    
00050     , inv_tauD_    
00051     , cP_          
00052     , cD_          
00053     , cutoffP_     
00054     , cutoffD_     
00055     , mass_;       
00056 };

00061 // ClipToBounds class definition
00063 
00064 class ClipToBounds
00065 {
00066 protected:
00068 
00070     void set_params(double gmin, double gmax) {
00071         min_ = gmin;
00072         max_ = gmax;
00073     }
00075 
00077     void check_bounds_impl(double & weight) const {
00078         if (weight > max_)
00079             weight = max_;
00080         else if (weight < min_)
00081             weight = min_;
00082     }
00083 
00084     double min_
00085     , max_;
00086 };
